# Supplementary Diagrams

## Physical Data Model (PDM)
Due to the diagrams analysis and size the physical data model are provided as separate annexes:

```{list-table} Annexes
:header-rows: 1
:name: annexes-table

* - Section
  - Description
* - {ref}`annex_1`)
  - Country module database schema
* - {ref}`annex_2`)
  - Core module database schema
* - {ref}`annex_3`)
  - Project module database schema
* - {ref}`annex_4`)
  - Search module database schema
* - {ref}`annex_5`)
  - User module database schema
```
